mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Teacher ( Number INT(11) NOT NULL, ID CHAR(15) NOT NULL, PW VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, Question VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, Answer_1 CHAR(10) NOT NULL, Answer_2 CHAR(10) NOT NULL, Answer_3 CHAR(10) NOT NULL, Answer_4 CHAR(10) NOT NULL, Answer_5 CHAR(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(Number) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Gride ( Number INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, Student Char(30) NOT NULL, ID CHAR(15) NOT NULL, Question VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, Answer_1 CHAR(10) NOT NULL, Answer_2 CHAR(10) NOT NULL, Answer_3 CHAR(10) NOT NULL, Answer_4 CHAR(10) NOT NULL, Answer_5 CHAR(10) NOT NULL, Score INT(11) NOT NULL, Rating CHAR(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(Number) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Teacher (Number, ID, PW, Question, Answer_1, Answer_2, Answer_3, Answer_4, Answer_5) VALUES (#{number}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{question}, #{answer1}, #{answer2}, #{answer3}, #{answer4}, #{answer5})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Teacher WHERE ID = #{id} AND PW = #{pw}
